style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="179.99999999999994" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-26" <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="280" y="230" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="230" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-30" source="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-27" target="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-29"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-27" value="<div style="border-color: var(--border-color);">zahl ← zahl * 3 + 1<br></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="180" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-32" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-29"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="430" y="144.75862068965512" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-29" value="schritte ← schritte &nbsp;+ 1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="130" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-33" value="Ende" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="390" y="450" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-36" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-35" target="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-33"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HWRAwpe7k8fu8D2fBJAd-35" value="print("Es waren", schritte, "Schritte nötig")" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="305" y="380" width="250" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
